data.news_body:

You are requested to take the same on your record.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Dear Sir / Madam

The trading window for dealing in the Securities of the Company has been closed from 1 January 2026 as communicated vide our letter dated 26 December 2026 and shall remain close till 17 February 2026 as per the code of conduct of Regulating Monitoring and Report of Trading by the designated person and immediate relative of the designated person of Kirloskar Industries Limited under the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 as amended.

You are requested to take the same on your record.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Kirloskar Industries Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Dear Sir / Madam

Pursuant to Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) 2015 we wish to inform you that the meeting of the Board of Directors will be held on 13 February 2026 inter - alia to consider and approve the Standalone and Consolidated unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31 December 2025.

You are requested to take the same on your record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body:
Dear Sir / Madam

The Members of the Company in their meeting held on 09 August 2022 had approved the re-appointment of Mr. D.Sivanandhan (DIN: 03607203) as an Independent Director of the Company for a second term with effect from 11 May 2022 up to his attaining the age of 75 years i.e. up to 02 February 2026.

Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements)Regulations 2015 this is to inform you that Mr. D.Sivanandhan(DIN : 03607203) Independent Director of the Company ceased to be an Independent Director of the Company and member of the Committee(s) as applicable on completion of his tenure with effect from 03 February 2026.

You are requested to take the same on your record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Cessation
data.news_body:
Dear Sir / Madam

The members of the Company in their meeting held on 09 August 2022 had approved the re-appointment of Mr. D. Sivanandhan (DIN:03607203) as an Independent Director of the Company for a second term with effect from 11 May 2022 up to his attaining the age of 75 years i.e. up to 02 February 2026.

Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 this is to inform you that Mr. D. Sivanandhan (DIN : 03607203) Independent Director of the Company has ceased to be an Independent Director of the Company and member of the Committee(s) as applicable on completion of his tenure with effect from 3 February 2026.

You are requested to take the same on your record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/Madam

Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 including amendments thereunder this is to inform you that the press release in respect of the Un-Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended 30 September 2025 is enclosed.

You are requested to take the same on your record.

data.caption: Intimation In Continuation Of Our Earlier Intimation Dated 14 November 2025 For Submitting The Board Meeting Outcome
data.news_body:
Dear Sir / Madam

In continuation of our earlier intimation dated 14 November 2025 pertaining to the submission of the Standalone and Consolidated Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and six months ended 30 September 2025 we wish to inform you that an unsigned page of the Limited Review Report for the Standalone Financial Results was inadvertently submitted.

Accordingly we request you to kindly take on record the duly signed Limited Review Report for the Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and six months ended 30 September 2025 enclosed herewith.

We confirm that except for the above-mentioned correction all other submissions made in connection with the outcome of the Board Meeting held on 14 November 2025 remain unchanged.

You are requested to take the same on your record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Cessation
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/Madam

You are requested to take the same on your record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/Madam

The Members of the Company in their meeting held on 20 August 2020 had approved the re-appointment of Mr. Tejas Deshpande (DIN: 01942507) as an Independent Director of the Company for a second term of five years with effect from 28 August 2020 to 27 August 2025.

Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 this is to inform you that Mr. Tejas Deshpande (DIN: 01942507) Independent Director of the Company has ceased to be a Director of the Company and member of the Committees as applicable on completion of his tenure with effect from 28 August 2025.

You are requested to take the same on your records.
